ALAS2-2019-1361

Amazon Linux 2 Security Advisory: ALAS-2019-1361
Advisory Release Date: 2019-11-11 17:40 Pacific
Advisory Updated Date: 2019-11-14 03:18 Pacific
Severity: Medium
References: CVE-2019-3840 
Issue Overview:

A NULL pointer dereference flaw was discovered in libvirt in the way it gets interface information through the QEMU agent. An attacker in a guest VM can use this flaw to crash libvirtd and cause a denial of service. (CVE-2019-3840)


Affected Packages:

libvirt


Issue Correction:
Run yum update libvirt to update your system.
